text: Events from the year 1971 in Sweden ==Incumbents== * Monarch – Gustaf VI Adolf * Prime Minister – Olof Palme ==Events== * 11–12 May - The Elm Conflict in Stockholm. ==Births== Eva Lund. * 8 January - Jesper Jansson, footballer * 1 May - Eva Lund, curler, Olympic champion in 2006 and 2010. * 5 November - Mårten Olander, golfer. * 7 November - Martin Björk, television presenter. * 9 November - Melinda Kinnaman, actress. ==Deaths== * 2 November - Hjalmar Andersson, athlete (born 1889). ==References== Category:1971 by country Category:Years of the 20th century in Sweden
title: 1971 in Sweden
